org.opendaylight.controller.frm

Interface FlowNodeReconciliation

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AsyncDataChangeListener<org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.InstanceIdentifier<?>,org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.DataObject>, java.lang.AutoCloseable, DataChangeListener, java.util.EventListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FlowNodeReconciliationImpl

    public interface FlowNodeReconciliation
extends DataChangeListener, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    forwardingrules-manager org.opendaylight.controller.frm FlowNodeReconciliation It represent Reconciliation functionality for every new device. So we have to read all possible pre-configured Flows, Meters and Groups from Config/DS and add all to new device. New device is represented by new FlowCapableNode in Operational/DS. So we have to add listener for Wildcarded path in base data change scope. WildCarded InstanceIdentifier: InstanceIdentifier.create(Nodes.class).child(Node.class).augmentation(FlowCapableNode.class)
    Author:
    Vaclav Demcak Created: Aug 26, 2014

      void flowNodeConnected(org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.InstanceIdentifier<FlowCapableNode> connectedNode)
      Method contains Node registration to ForwardingRulesManager functionality as a prevention to use a validation check to the Operational/DS for identify pre-configure transaction and serious device commit in every transaction.

    • Method Detail

      • flowNodeConnected

        void flowNodeConnected(org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.InstanceIdentifier<FlowCapableNode> connectedNode)
        Method contains Node registration to ForwardingRulesManager functionality as a prevention to use a validation check to the Operational/DS for identify pre-configure transaction and serious device commit in every transaction. Second part of functionality is own reconciliation pre-configure Flows, Meters and Groups.
        Parameters:
        connectedNode - - KeyedInstanceIdentifier to new Node

      • flowNodeDisconnected

        void flowNodeDisconnected(org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.InstanceIdentifier<FlowCapableNode> disconnectedNode)
        Method contains functionality for registered Node removing from
        Parameters:
        disconnectedNode - - KeyedInstanceIdentifier to removed Node
